name: Flyin' Saucer Attack!
description:
This prototype is my end of year project in my Higher Professional Vocational Program.

!!! CONTROLLER NEEDED !!!

Use Left Stick to aim at the enemies,

Press the X/A button to dash through enemies when aiming at them

Hold X/A button to perform a Double Dash

R1/RB to perform a non-lethal, downwards dash

Responsible for all the art: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rafamata/
